name: High Protein Oats & Berries Bowl
directions: Mix oats with desired water amount and microwave 1-2 minutes. Stir in other ingredients.

name: Vanilla-Berry Protein Shake

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (⅔ cup) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
Optional: spinach or kale to taste

directions:
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.
Notes
Use different protein powder flavors as desired.

name: Cottage Cheese Eggs & Avocado Toast

ingredients.ingredient: 2 egg whites (66 g or ¼ cup liquid egg whites)
2 slices (90 g) Ezekiel or Dave’s Killer Bread
Everything but the Bagel seasoning to taste

directions: Scramble eggs with cottage cheese in a nonstick skillet. Toast the bread and spread avocado on top. Sprinkle with seasoning and serve.

name: Blueberry Protein Pancakes

ingredients.ingredient: 2 egg whites (66 g or ¼ cup liquid egg whites)
40 g (3 tbsp) nonfat plain Greek yogurt

directions:
Mix all ingredients (except syrup) into a smooth batter. Cook pancakes on a nonstick skillet until golden.
Meal Prep Tips
Can also be made as waffles. Batch cook, freeze, and reheat in toaster for easy prep.

name: Egg Scramble & Toast

ingredients.ingredient: 4 egg whites (132 g or ½ cup liquid egg whites)
100 g (1 cup) sautéed veggies (bell pepper + onion)
1 slice (45 g) Ezekiel or Dave’s Killer Bread

directions: Sauté veggies and black beans in a nonstick skillet. Scramble in whole eggs and egg whites. Toast the bread and top with egg scramble. Optional: garnish with Cholula and minced cilantro.

name: High Protein Yogurt Parfait
directions: Mix yogurt, chia seeds and protein. Top with berries and almonds.

name: Veggie Egg White Frittata Muffins

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup diced mixed vegetables (bell peppers, spinach, mushrooms)

directions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Spray muffin tin with nonstick spray. Heat nonstick spray in a skillet and sauté vegetables 3-4 minutes. Divide vegetables evenly into 4 muffin cups. Pour egg whites over vegetables and top with feta. Bake 20-25 minutes or until set.
Meal Prep Tips
Store in fridge for 4 days or freeze up to 1 month. Microwave ~30 seconds to reheat.

name: Egg, Avocado & Ham Veggie Bagel Sandwich

ingredients.ingredient: 1 thin-style bagel (55 g, Dave’s Killer or O’Doughs)
½ cup (125 g) liquid egg whites
2 oz (56 g) lean deli ham (Kirkland 98% fat-free)
½ cup diced mixed vegetables (bell peppers, spinach, mushrooms)
Salt, pepper, everything but the bagel seasoning
Optional: 1 Tbsp (15 g) light cream cheese (+35 kcal, +2 g protein)

directions:
Sauté peppers/onions with spray 2-3 minutes. Add egg whites + egg; season and cook into patty. Warm ham 30 sec per side. Toast bagel and layer all ingredients on bagel.
Meal Prep Tips
Make 2-3 sandwiches, wrap in foil, refrigerate ≤3 days, reheat in toaster or air fryer ~3 minutes.

name: Mexican Burrito Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, sliced
100 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
75 g (1 cup) bell peppers + onions, sautéed
30 g (2 tbsp) nonfat plain Greek yogurt
Fresh cilantro + lime juice; salt & pepper to taste
Optional spices: chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic/onion powder

directions: Layer rice and beans. Add chicken, peppers/onions, romaine, tomatoes, avocado. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime, and seasonings.

name: Southwest Chicken Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, diced
150 g (1 cup) roasted sweet potato cubes
100 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
Optional spices: smoked paprika, cumin, garlic powder

directions: Add quinoa and sweet potatoes. Top with chicken, corn, beans, spinach. Finish with cilantro, lime, and season.

name: Mediterranean Power Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, sliced
Optional spices: oregano, basil, garlic powder, red pepper flakes

directions: Layer quinoa, chickpeas, spinach. Add chicken, cucumber, tomatoes. Top with hummus and tzatziki, lemon, herbs, and seasonings.

name: Teriyaki Chicken, Veggies & Rice Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, cubed
40 g (2 tbsp) G. Hughes sugar-free teriyaki sauce
Optional flavoring: fresh garlic, fresh ginger, green onion garnish

directions: Add rice, then chicken, broccoli, edamame. Drizzle teriyaki; add optional flavorings and seasonings to the chicken/vegetable mix.

name: Ginger & Garlic Salmon Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) cooked salmon fillet, flaked
40 g (¼ cup) red onion, thinly sliced
20 g (1 tbsp) low-sodium soy sauce; salt & pepper
Optional flavoring: fresh garlic, fresh ginger, sesame seeds

directions: Base of quinoa and spinach. Top with salmon, cucumber, edamame, onion. Drizzle soy and optional flavorings on salmon while cooking or over finished bowl.

name: Steak, Sweet Potato & Roasted Vegetables Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) grilled sirloin steak, sliced
100 g (1 cup) roasted bell peppers + zucchini
150 g (1 cup) roasted sweet potato cubes

directions: Season and cook steak and vegetables with optional herbs. Arugula base. Add roasted vegetables, potatoes, and steak.

name: Caprese High Protein Chicken & Pasta Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, sliced
85 g (1 cup) cooked Barilla Protein+ rotini pasta
20 g (2 tsp) balsamic glaze; salt & pepper

directions: Season and cook chicken. Combine pasta, spinach, tomatoes, mozzarella, basil. Top with chicken; drizzle balsamic.

name: Salmon Sushi Bowl (Cooked)

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) cooked salmon fillet, flaked
20 g (1 tbsp) low-sodium soy sauce; salt & pepper to taste
Optional flavoring: sesame seeds, fresh ginger, green onion garnish

directions: Add rice and spinach. Top with salmon, edamame, cucumber, carrots, avocado. Add nori, soy, and seasonings/garnishes to taste.

name: Chicken, Sweet Potato & Black Bean Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 63 g (2.2 oz) grilled chicken breast, diced
100 g (⅔ cup) roasted sweet potato cubes
80 g (⅓ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
Optional spices: cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder

directions: Cook chicken with spices. Place spinach in a bowl, add sweet potato, black beans, peppers, corn, chicken. Top with yogurt, cilantro, and lime.

name: Simple Basics: Chicken + Baked Potato + Green Peas

ingredients.ingredient: 30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt (potato topping)
Optional seasonings: garlic, parsley, lemon, G Hughes sugar free sauce of choice

directions: Serve chicken with baked potato (topped with Greek yogurt) and peas.

name: Simple Basics: Salmon + Sweet Potato + Broccoli

ingredients.ingredient: Optional seasonings: dill, lemon, garlic, G Hughes sugar free sauce of choice

directions: Serve salmon with sweet potato and broccoli.

name: Simple Basics: Steak + Mashed Potatoes + Asparagus

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) grilled top sirloin steak
150 g (1 cup) mashed red potatoes (with plain nonfat Greek yogurt)
Optional seasonings: rosemary, thyme, garlic, G Hughes sugar free sauce of choice

directions: Serve steak with mashed potatoes and asparagus.

name: High Protein Pasta Bake

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) cooked ground turkey (93%+ lean)
85 g (1 cup) cooked Barilla Protein+ pasta
Garlic powder, onion powder, dried basil, dried oregano, salt & pepper to taste

directions: Mix pasta, marinara, cottage cheese, spinach, turkey. Place in baking dish, top with mozzarella; bake until bubbly.

name: Chicken & Black Bean Enchiladas

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) cooked ground or shredded chicken breast
100 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
75 g (½ cup) bell peppers + onions, sautéed
30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt (topping)
Fresh cilantro + lime; salt & pepper to taste
Optional spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika

directions: Fill tortilla with chicken, beans, peppers/onions. Roll into dish, pour over sauce; bake to heat through. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime.

name: Ground Beef or Turkey Tacos

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) cooked lean ground beef or turkey
80 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
Optional spices: chili powder, cumin, garlic powder

directions: Fill tortillas with meat, beans, peppers/onions, romaine, tomatoes, avocado. Top with yogurt, cilantro, lime.

name: Spaghetti with Ground Turkey Bolognese

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) cooked ground turkey (93%+ lean)
85 g (1 cup) cooked Barilla Protein+ spaghetti noodles
40 g (2 cups) side mixed greens salad
Garlic powder, basil, oregano, salt & pepper to taste

directions: Cook turkey and then simmer in marinara. Serve over pasta with salad on the side.

name: Stir Fry - Chicken or Shrimp

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled shrimp or chicken breast
Garlic, ginger, salt & pepper to taste

directions: Stir-fry protein with veggies, soy sauce and seasonings. Serve over rice.

name: White Chicken Chili

ingredients.ingredient: 100 g (½ cup) white beans, drained & rinsed
30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt (to finish)
Fresh cilantro; salt & pepper to taste
Optional spices: cumin, garlic powder, smoked paprika

directions: Simmer chicken, beans, peppers, onion, broth and spices. Finish with yogurt and cilantro.

name: Chicken, Sweet Potato & Black Bean Tacos

ingredients.ingredient: 60 g (½ cup) roasted sweet potato cubes
80 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
66 g (2.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, diced
Fresh cilantro + lime; salt & pepper to taste
Optional spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika

directions: Cook chicken and black beans with spices in skillet. Warm tortillas; fill with sweet potato, beans, peppers, chicken. Top with cilantro and lime.

name: Chicken, Potato & Brussels Sprouts Sheet Pan

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) chicken breast, cut into strips or cubes
150 g (1 cup) red potatoes, cut into wedges
5 g (1 tsp) olive oil (light spray or drizzle)
Optional spices: garlic, smoked paprika, thyme, rosemary

directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Place chicken, potatoes, Brussels sprouts, and red onion on a parchment-lined sheet pan. Lightly spray or drizzle with olive oil and season. Roast 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway, until chicken is cooked and potatoes are tender.

name: Beef or Turkey & Red Bean Chili (Crock Pot)

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) cooked lean ground turkey or lean ground beef
100 g (½ cup) kidney beans, drained & rinsed
100 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
100 g (½ cup) diced tomatoes in juice
30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt (topping)
Fresh cilantro; salt & pepper to taste
Optional spices: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, salsa

directions: Add all ingredients to crock pot; cook 4-6 hours. Top with yogurt and cilantro.

name: Chicken Fajitas (Crock Pot)

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced
80 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
Fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper to taste
Seasonings: chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, garlic

directions: Place chicken, peppers, onions, and seasonings in crock pot. Cook 4-6 hours. Warm tortillas; fill with crock-pot mixture, black beans, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Chicken, Lentil & Vegetable Soup (Crock Pot)

ingredients.ingredient: Fresh parsley; salt & pepper to taste

directions: Add all to crock pot; cook 4-6 hours on low until tender. Garnish with parsley.

name: BBQ Pulled Chicken Sandwiches

ingredients.ingredient: 40 g (2 tbsp) G. Hughes sugar-free BBQ sauce
Seasonings: smoked paprika, garlic powder; salt & pepper to taste

directions: Slow-cook chicken with BBQ sauce; shred. Serve on bun with green beans on the side.

name: Greek Chicken Powerhouse Salad

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) grilled chicken breast, sliced
60 g (2 cups) spinach + kale mix, chopped
30 g (2 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
10 g (1 tbsp) slivered almonds or walnuts
Fresh parsley and Greek seasoning, lemon, salt & pepper to taste

directions: Mix greens, tomatoes, cucumber, chickpeas. Top with chicken and olives. Whisk yogurt, tahini, lemon, parsley; drizzle. Sprinkle nuts.

name: High-Protein Chicken Caesar

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (5.3 oz) grilled chicken breast, sliced
50 g (3 tbsp) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
Lemon juice, Dijon mustard, garlic, salt & pepper to taste

directions: Whisk yogurt, oil, lemon, Dijon, garlic for dressing. Mix greens, chicken, Parmesan. Drizzle dressing.

name: Quinoa Taco Salad

ingredients.ingredient: 80 g (½ cup) black beans, drained & rinsed
120 g (4.2 oz) cooked shredded chicken breast
Fresh cilantro + lime juice to taste

directions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.

name: Salmon & Apple Power Salad

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4.2 oz) grilled salmon fillet, flaked
60 g (2 cups) spinach + arugula mix, chopped
40 g (¼ cup) red onion, thinly sliced
80 g (½ cup) Granny Smith apple, diced (skin on)
Dijon mustard, garlic, oregano; salt & pepper to taste

directions: Mix greens, cucumber, onion, edamame, apple. Top with salmon, walnuts, feta. Whisk vinaigrette and drizzle on top.

name: Boiled Eggs, Edamame, Hummus & Veggies

ingredients.ingredient: 100 g (1 cup) raw veggies (cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, celery, broccoli, etc.)

directions: Boil eggs in advance. Microwave frozen edamame and season (salt or Everything But The Bagel seasoning). Serve with hummus and fresh veggies for dipping.

name: Edamame Avocado Toast & String Cheese

ingredients.ingredient: 2 slices (90 g) Dave’s Killer Bread or Ezekiel bread

directions: Toast bread. Microwave edamame. Spread avocado on toast, top with edamame and hemp hearts. Season as desired. Serve string cheese on the side.

name: Barebell Protein Bar & Protein Yogurt
directions: Eat together as a high-protein, grab-and-go snack.

name: PBfit Banana Rice Cakes & Oikos Yogurt

ingredients.ingredient: 16 g (¼ cup dry) PBfit powder (mixed with water to spread)
150 g (⅔ cup) Oikos Pro yogurt (any flavor)

directions: Mix PBfit with water to form a spread. Spread onto rice cakes, top with banana slices, hemp seeds, and drizzle with honey. Serve yogurt on the side.

name: Tuna & Avocado Crackers Plate

ingredients.ingredient: 1 can (120 g) tuna in water, drained
100 g (1 cup) raw veggies (carrots, cucumber, bell pepper) or 100 g (¾ cup) fresh fruit

directions: Mash avocado and mix with tuna, onion, and celery. Season as desired. Serve with crackers and veggies or fruit on the side.

name: High Protein Mini Charcuterie Snack Box

ingredients.ingredient: 120 g (4 oz) nitrate-free deli turkey or chicken breast slices
40 g (2 slices) part-skim mozzarella or 2 light string cheeses
100 g raw veggies (cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, celery)

directions: Roll deli turkey or chicken into bite-sized rolls. Pair with cheese, crackers, hummus, and veggies. Add fruit if desired. Serve chilled.

name: Shrimp Cocktail with Avocado Rice Cakes
directions: Prep shrimp or purchase pre-cooked. Spread avocado over rice cakes, sprinkle with hemp seeds. Garnish with lemon and parsley if desired. Serve with cocktail sauce.

name: High Protein Berry Cheesecake Bowl

ingredients.ingredient: 200 g (¾ cup) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
80 g (½ cup) mixed berries of choice
5 g (1 tsp) graham cracker crumbs or oats for crunch

directions: Blend yogurt, protein powder, and cottage cheese until creamy. Stir in berries and sprinkle with graham crumbs. Chill ~15 minutes before eating.

name: Apple Cinnamon Protein Parfait

ingredients.ingredient: 150 g (⅔ cup) plain nonfat Greek yogurt
1 medium apple (180 g), diced & microwaved with cinnamon until soft

directions: Mix yogurt and protein until smooth. Layer with warm cinnamon-apple mixture. Sprinkle walnuts on top.

name: Ninja Creami Vanilla & Berries Frozen Yogurt

ingredients.ingredient: 200 g (¾ cup) plain nonfat Greek yogurt

directions: Mix all ingredients. Freeze in Ninja Creami pint container overnight. Spin once (re-spin with more milk if needed). Mix in or top with berries before serving.
